home.star: If you like Ascent, Star it ;D

guide.prepare_guide: Please follow the guide in notification for following ADB pairing process

notification_description.guide_port:
Open wireless debugging and click 'Pair device with pairing code'
Enter the pairing port by clicking the following button
notification_description.guide_code: Please enter the pairing code (6 bit) below the button
notification_description.error_init: Foreground service start failed, please contact developer
notification_description.pair_success: Pairing success, please return to Ascent
notification_description.pair_fail: Pair failed, please check pair code

guide.prepare_guide:
Open game after connect
You'll be notified on success

notification_description.connecting: Wireless debug connecting, please enter port by clicking the button
